style_property.title: Active user count badge color
style_property.description: The color of the user count badge for chat navigation and tabs when there are active users in the chat.

style_property.title: Active user count color
style_property.description: The color of the user count for chat navigation and tabs when there are active users in the chat.

style_property.title: Chat bar button
style_property.description: The bar button that displays the number of chat users.

style_property.title: Chat bar container
style_property.description: The chat bar that shows up at the bottom of the screen when using "All pages" mode.

style_property.title: Chat container
style_property.description: The main chat container.

style_property.title: Chat content height
style_property.description: The height of the chat content.

style_property.title: Conversation list item
style_property.description: Individual item in the conversation user list.

style_property.title: Conversation list item active
style_property.description: Individual item in the conversation user list, active state.

style_property.title: Conversation list item hover
style_property.description: Individual item in the conversation user list, hover state.

style_property.title: Message date
style_property.description: Styling of the message date.

style_property.description: The color of the delete icon.

style_property.description: The color of the edit icon.

style_property.description: The color of the help icon.

style_property.title: Icon font size
style_property.description: The font size of all the icons used in the chat.

style_property.title: Like icon color
style_property.description: The color of the like icon.

style_property.title: Link icon color
style_property.description: The color of the link icon.

style_property.title: Chat maximized mode content height
style_property.description: The height of the chat content in maximized mode.

style_property.description: The color of the user count badge for chat navigation and tabs when there are no active users in the chat.

style_property.title: No user count color
style_property.description: The color of the user count for chat navigation and tabs when there are no active users in the chat.

style_property.title: Options icon color
style_property.description: The color of the options icon.

style_property.title: Chat page content height
style_property.description: The height of the chat content on the dedicated chat page.

style_property.description: The color of the quote icon.
